blocks.section_text: *Project Configuration*: Manage project configurations for CI/CD.
*Pipeline Configuration*: Manage pipelines to deploy and promote a package.
*Property Migration*: Manage properties to be migrated during deployments.
=_('data.workato_variable.6f891857.recipe_management').is_true? ? "*Recipe Management*: Manage recipes of a project within any environment." : ""
=_('data.workato_variable.6f891857.deploy_release').is_true? ? "*Deploy Release*: Deploy an existing release to relevant environments." : ""
=_('data.workato_variable.6f891857.deploy_unreleased_package').is_true? ? "*Deploy Unreleased Package*: Deploy a package version to non-production environments." : ""
=_('data.workato_variable.6f891857.manage_user_access').is_true? ? "*Manage User Access*: Manage role based access for users" : ""

code.comment: Trigger on Workbot for Slack command "workato cicd start" to present different options.
